extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Deep Freeze badge setting status of a drive. "Enabled" means that the Deep Freeze badge will be displayed on Frozen Drives.
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh dfUsername="EditFromTemplate_DeepFreeze_Service_Account_Username" dfPassword="EditFromTemplate_DeepFreeze_Service_Account_Password" if [ -f "/Library/Application Support/Faronics/Deep Freeze/CLI" ]; then result=`/Library/Application\ Support/Faronics/Deep\ Freeze/CLI "$dfUsername" "$dfPassword" status | grep "DON'T BADGE FROZEN DRIVES" | grep "FALSE"` if [ "$result" == "" ]; then result="Disabled" else result="Enabled" fi fi echo "<result>$result</result>"
